articles.title: How Meta Ray Ban Smart Glasses Displaced My Smartphone On Opening Day - Forbes
articles.description: Thanks to their form factor and functionality, Meta Ray Ban Smart Glasses can reduce users' reliance on smartphones for special events such as MLB's Opening Day.
